Reviews.Title: Good Phone Specs But Not Working As It should
Reviews.Author: Anne Feedback
Reviews.Content: The technical specs and features on this phone were good when presented online but lacking when the actual phone was recevied.  The audio player was not working and showed memory card 'empty' when songs were played.  Also very crucial is the fact that the default factory setting was set in the Spanish language.  In the United States, the default factory setting for equipments or devices is English and this information should be made available on the ad.Another factor to consider is that the manufacturer BLU Products will only accept items for warranty repair TRHOUGH the distributor.  This will normally take between 4 to 8 weeks to be completed.  This means that your cell phone will be out of commission for about 1 to 2 months, which is quite long if you do not have a backup phone.Lastly, was very dissatisfied with customer service by UnlockedCellPhoneKings.  Sent a customer service follow-up inquiry on seller's initial reply regarding defective audio player "It should play your songs from your memory card once it is correctly formatted".  When inquired what exactly was meant by CORRECTLY formatted, seller NEVER bothered to respond.This could have been a very good budget phone had it worked the way it should.

Reviews.Title: Works Fine
Reviews.Author: M1911 Guy "m1911guy"
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic phone. good for overseas travel. the memory is very small basicly about 20 kbytes. on the phone. but you can add a mini sim card. and have tons of memory. but i did not by this phone for memory and music. thats why i have an ipod or regular cell phone. this is good for basic use. and works great in latin america.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Shawny
Reviews.Content: The longest I've gotten out of the battery was 17 days I believe. Battery's great. Sound quality could be better and wish it had t9 texting. I'm currently using this phone because of the battery life; one less device for me to charge every day.

Reviews.Title: I am not satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Pedro Celis
Reviews.Content: I liked some phone features such as long battery life and double dim. But a few days will damage the screen, so you can not read the text message, the screen is very sensitive. I am not satisfied.

Reviews.Title: A lot to like
Reviews.Author: Dawnimac "Dawnimac"
Reviews.Content: i have resisted getting  a smartphone and I do like the fact that this can accommodate bothmy cell company Sim cards.  However it chose to eliminate some of my contacts and part of itdoes not work - you cannot save new contacts.  Also only one call chime is available,On the plus side I like the readout and when texting, you see each letter of each key,

Reviews.Title: Product ok, older people should like it
Reviews.Author: AGA
Reviews.Content: I don't like it does not have any ringtones to choose from. Besides this it's ok. Worth the price !

Reviews.Title: Poor Tech support and non working
Reviews.Author: Michael Sean Duffy "Duffy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my wife whom is aa techphobe.  The phone is great in a lot respects but you can't adjust the time or the menus are incomplete in the software.  When I contacted BLU, the support is non existent and they were no help for something that should have been simple.  On second reply to them they never responded back at all 3months ago.  Bad choice...phone has lots of potential only to be screwed up by poor tech and management support

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual-Band GSM cell phone compatible with GSM 850/1900 Quad Band
1.8-Inch LCD Display, VGA Camera and Video Recorder
MicroSD Slot, Flashlight, FM Radio, MP3 and MP4 Player
Phone Type: BAR, Simple, Handy and Fit For All
ProductInfo.Name: BLU T190b Unlocked GSM Mobile Phone with Dual Sim and GSM Dual-Band 850/1900-Black/Blue
